mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( account, password, nick_name, signature, age, email, tel, school, solved, submit, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{account}, #{password}, #{nick_name}, #{signature}, #{age}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{school}, #{solved}, #{submit}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: ORDER BY solved DESC, submit DESC LIMIT #{start_row}, #{page_size}
mapper.update:
UPDATE user
submit = submit + #{submit},
solved = solved + #{solved},
id = #{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT id, account, password, nick_name, signature, age, email, tel, school, solved, submit, status, create_time, update_time FROM user
